Goodbye Glados

I MISS YOU ALREADY

:(
2的可玩性还是不错的，只是我觉得后面的关卡没有很有趣的感觉。联机模式是很有趣的，跟朋友一起合作，还能互坑。
Mostly downloaded the game because it was on sale but the nostalgia from playing 1 and 2 on the Xbox 360 in my earlier years is truely something else. Love 🖤🖤

以前玩过盗版的，还和室友联过机。打折后入的，可是没人和我玩联机TAT。

游戏很不错，可能有些人会觉得晕，v社的3d引擎就是这样的，没办法。

另外结尾BGM简直治愈，好听到爆炸，已经提名“最需要抱抱反派奖”。
厉害了，很有创意，很喜欢、联机部分也很爽

不过为什么我玩着想吐。

建议你购买双人包，一起玩超有趣。

Even better than the first, and has plenty more content.
I love the story line, but still, I kinda hate the part where I have to put that moron Wheatly in charge.

This game will always hold a special place in my heart. Also, I love the inclusion of potatoes. I love POTATO.

I give this an 11.5/10
el mejor juego que jugué en toda mi vida <3 Es una obra de arte. Simplemente perfecto
친구가 건방지게 춤을 추고 있다면 발 아래에 포탈을 만들어 물에 보내주면 아주 좋아합니다. 협동모드를 계속하다 생각이 멈추거든 다음날 도전하는게 정신건강에 이로웠다고 하고싶다. 늅늅

One of my favorite ever games. Great story, fun characters, and a simple yet fun physics engine to go with the concept of putting two portal and walking through one to get out the other. What makes the experience more enjoyable in singleplayer is GLaDOS, one of the most iconic villians in gaming history. I definitely recommend this for anyone as an fps and puzzle game.
Is an explanation really necessary?
fun.

Portal 2 is one of these games, which never get old, and I'll enjoy it everytime. Great puzzle game with humour and nice plot. Co-operation and additional community maps make this game only better. It's a absolute "must-have" in every players library. I really recommend it to everyone!
If you like puzzle games then this game is for you. it's great!!!
simplesmente incrivel
Лучшая игра EVER!

10 порталов из 10
Хоть и приобрела я ее только сейчас, со скидкой, но игра стоит своих денег.
+графика отменная
+приятная озвучка
+разнообразие
+заставит твой мозг работать тщательнее

-(НЕ НАШЛА)!
РАЗРАБЫ, СПАСИБО!
_______________
Jogo fantastico, não me arrependo de ter comprado, mecanica simples.

Portal 2:Um Jogo foda que me impressionou muito no final,e como eu zerei ele posso falar para vcs os prós e contras desta dlç de jogo.

Prós
-Não precisa ter jogado o Portal 1 para joga-lo (mas ele ira falar certas coisas que aconteceram no 1° jogo)
-História Foda que realmente continua a jornada desta mulher para escapar do Aperture
-Puzzles realmente desafiantes
-Não existe muita cutscene no jogo e quando tem é algo que vc pode se movimentar para achar um melhor angulo para assistir a dlç acontecer 
-Suporte a multiplayer e a steam workshop podendo abaixar mapas personalizados feitos pelos fãs.

Contras
-Não existe fases de desafio sem fazer parte da história como no primeiro jogo tinha (desculpe se tiver mas não achei)
-(Este não é um fator contra,é mais uma observação) Este jogo é realmente para pessoas geniais,se vc zerar o jogo sem procurar ajuda na internet,considere-se uma pessoa bem inteligente
Legen...Wait for it...Dary!! if you loved the first one, you'll fall in love with this one!
10/10 love this game, the story is truely remarkable and the characters become memorable so easily. i would love to see a film adaptation or further story ark some day
es un excelente juego muy entretenido lo recomiendo
Amazing

Ich hab lange nciht mehr sooo ein gutes Spiel gespielt. So gut wie an einem Stück durchgezockt. 
Portal 1 und 2 würde ich jederzeit jedem empfehlen, der Bock auf etwas Denksport hat!
爽完了
bombe

One of the last things we herd from valve..... a beautiful game... im not hip with valve and have just let them do thier thing these days.... i think they are a walmart now, i mean they did do thier own kinda vr.... im not really excited because vr is being handled like a child would handle a new toy only thing changed is money is the factor instead of fun.... in a lot of ways.... unfortunately..... but here it is.

Portal 2 is a great mate to portal. A well thoughout expansion of the portal theme and well balanced and thoughtfull extension of the first. This is how games should be made. Not even AAA has the quality of this product on the best of days.....

Its just sad when a great artist is discovered and they lost thier passion of thier talent.... its like having to watch a wonderful friut rott till it time to throw away....
BEST GAME EVER. Waiting for portal 3. (:
Best story line ever! I could not stop playing this game. It was like watching a TV show non-stop till the end of the season. If they had Portal 3 I'd be first in line.

One of the best games I've played, Valve never fail to make an awesome game, Portal 2 is fantastic!

Portal 2 je neuvěřitelná přiběhová logická hra, u které se zabaví každý hráč z jakekékoliv generace. Po projetí singleplayeru (11/10 příběh) můžete zase "rageovat" i se svým kámošem v kooperačním módu, který je podle mě težší než single, protože musíte se svým kamarádem (pokud nějakýho máte :D) přemýšlet telepaticky nebo zapnout odpočet, kdy máte skočit. Kdo tuhle hru nerozjede, tak pravděpodobně má Mikrovlnku a kabely jsou zastrčené v zemákách (bramborách). :D

2 358 489/10 :D

Obra maestra, secuela de otra obra maestra. Tiene una duración mayor que Portal, mejores gráficos, variedad, y nuevas mecánicas para los puzles. Tiene un toque de humor en los diálogos. Tiene modo cooperativo, el cual se puede aprovechar para jugar con otro amigo. 

11/10
This should be nominated for an... Oh wait.
Legend 10|10

Ještě nikdy sem neviděl tak skvělej příběh. 

10/10

Pontos positivos:

- Ótimos gráficos

Pontos negativos:

Играл давно, сейчас зимнии скидки, вот и решил взять поиграть, вспомнить все. Игра шикарная, с другом играем вдвоем, плюс можно брать контент из мастерской, так что скучно не будет, сюжет это еще не конец игры.
Очень классная игра, действительно захватывающий и долгий сюжет, в отличие от первой части, немного выносит мозг) но в этом нет ничего плохого)  в общем оценка 10 из 10! шикарно!
DIFFERENT

言わずと知れた名作。1と基本は変わらないが新しいギミックがさらに面白くなってます。
ポータルを使っての移動は相も変わらず不思議な感覚です。
2ではステージ作成ができ他の人のステージクリアでアバターの衣装などが
手に入りいまだにやっている人も多いです。
何度か無料配布されてますが、持ってないならセール時に1とのバンドルを買ってしまってもいいかも
Uno de los mejores juegos para los amantes de los puzzles y resolver acertijos. Una buena historia, una gráfica excelente... Muy recomendado
Now i know why this game got nominated for the "Villain most in need of a hug"-award.

Wheatley es un gran personaje que tecnicamente no es un villano a fin al cabo, se merece estar Nominado y espero que gane.

Good

This is hands down one of the best games i've ever played. Hilarious dialogue, great puzzles, awesome story, great multyplayer. I have already had plenty of hours of fun playing the game with friends or alone. The fan community has also created awesome workshop maps for you to play. This is a must have for every gamer. I love it.

Как это часто бывает вторая часть обычно разочаровывает, но Portal 2 это лучшая игра в жанре головоломки совмещенная с прекрасным сюжетом, если вы цените сюжет и любите занять свой мозг чем нибудь непростым то игра Portal 2 подходит для вас, так же рекомендую для осведомленности и вашего же наслаждения пройти первую часть Portal.
通关后的音乐简直萌翻我了！！比英普瑞斯还傲娇！

Un juego increible de tipo puzzle sin olvidar su historia comica y original , portal es un juego para ejercitar tu cerebro y no importa que te hayas pasado la campaña tienes muchos otros mapa de la comunidad por completar en definitiva un juego para pasar un buen tiempo solo o con un amigo.

먼저 이게임을 나는  약 5년전 쯤에 처음 해보았었다. 그때 느꼈던 신선함과 충격을 아직도 잊지못한다.단언컨데 이 게임은 정말 재미없게 했다는 사람을 찾기란 하늘의  별따기일 것이다. 그만큼 참신하고 소재가 독창적이다 .

Still the best puzzle with great storyline .

C'est bien simple, un jeu proche de la perfection.
De ce que j'ai vécu c'est le jeu qui propose :
_la meilleure intro/tutoriel
_la meilleur ecriture
_la meilleure fin

L'histoire est géniale, les personnages sont très bien construits, l'humour est présente tout en restant légère. La VF est parfaite pour moi. 

GlaDos est définitvement un de me personnages préférés dans le jeu video.

Although, I am quite a newbie in the world of computer games, Portal 2 had me addicted to it.  Now, whenever I see white surfaces, I imagine creating portals on them! 
I loved killing turrets in all possible ways. Also really enjoyed Cave Johnson, GLadOS and Wheatley.
